697920.name: Throne of the Dead - Halloween DLC
697920.description:
Don your scariest costume and prepare for the onslaught that is Throne of the Dead's Halloween DLC!

Face off pumpkin headed hordes and un-dead campers across two all new maps, Graveyard and Camp Site!

Graveyard: Protect your throne from the brain-craving pumpkin-headed zombies in this spooky themed thriller! 15 waves, one bone-blasting duck, and hundreds of skeletons, ghosts and pumpkins, it's probably best you're already on the toilet for this one....

Campsite: Step right into the 80's with this classic thriller movie themed map. Protect yourselves from the incoming horde of *still drunk* un-dead teen campers. It's probably best to watch out for whatever put them in their graves too.....

Along with 6 more stars to master, you also get three spooky skins to unlock: Ghost, Skeleton and Pumpkin!
697920.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
